com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.alchemy.v1

Class AlchemyDataNews

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.AlchemyService
        • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.alchemy.v1.AlchemyDataNews

  • public class AlchemyDataNews
extends AlchemyService
    AlchemyData News indexes 250k to 300k English language news and blog articles every day with historical search available for the past 60 days.
    Version:
    v1
    See Also:
    Alchemy Data News

        public ServiceCall<VolumeResult> getVolume(String start,
                                           String end,
                                           String timeSlice)
        Get a handle on how many documents are relevant for your query.
        Parameters:
        start - String the time (in UTC seconds) of the beginning of the query duration,
